title: Is humming songs that contain kufr in them without saying the words, kufr? #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: yeah I I in the past I used to play games which contain cfer uh like uh multiple gods and stuff but I repented from watching that but uh those songs in those games like still in my play in my head and some and these songs can contain cfer words but some but sometimes I utter the sometimes I sing those songs but without but without uttering words just a beat uh is that uh is that uh goes does that go under under kufur or not no this is not kufur it is sinful because it will continue to resonate in your head and the words and the lyrics are still there though you did not pronounce them but by humming the song and the the the music and the Tunes the words are in your head and they are repeated though you did not pronounce them so you're sinful for that but this is not inshah
